fields.helpSection:
Login to your airtable account 
 Go to Dashboard -> Edit Profile 
 To the right side, you should see the personal access token generated associated with your user account

fields.description: Company name registered with airtable account
fields.helpSection:
Enter the comapny name that you provided when you signed up to Freshservice 
 If your Freshservice account URL is: acmecorp.freshservice.com then your domain name is acmecorp
